author: toddchapin
title: Building the Realverse
description: Геопространственная картография Dapp Виртуальный цифровой двойник глобуса должен быть разработан, чтобы нанести на карту не нанесенное на карту, создавая место, где находится экосистема Cardano

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer problem statement and solution are aligned with the challenge which is to create a monopoly like game on Cardano. However, the proposer did not mention on how will this game adds value to the ecosystem. Is it by the utility of the mapping features of the game? Or is it by the users that the proposer aims to bring on-board Cardano? The key metrics and goals are also unclear. Apart from delivering the monopoly game, what does this game is trying to achieve?
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer did not provide any verifiable information on their skills and experience required to successfully implement the project. The proposer also did not provide information on the required manpower and resources needed for the project. Furthermore, there are no budget breakdown of the requested budget. Moreover, the proposer did not provide risk management plan incase there is challenges that they might face in the future that might need additional funding. In addition, the proposer did not provide a timetable to complete the work.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal did not provide a roadmap and a time horizon for achievement. Please provide a timeframe for the voters to keep track of your progress. Also, please provide key metrics and KPI that defines the success of the proposal.  In addition, there are no platforms for voters to receive updates on the progress of the project.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is far-reaching and is ahead of time. There is a need to create interest in this exciting new avenue for NFT use. Metaverse is also envisaging the use of this virtual world-building and is likely to become a monetizable soon than many anticipations.
f6_assessments.q1: I could not identify a direct reference to the proposer's past work, however, the reference of  realmapinfo CEO and the proposal makes me belive that the proposer will be able to complete what he is trying to achieve.
f6_assessments.q2: The work required to be completed in this project is substantial and the fund requested in just 10K USD. It can be seen that the proposer is likely to be investing his money. There is no clear KPI and timeliness which makes it difficult to audit the proposal.  However, this is an important experiment that can yield an out-of-band return to the ecosystem.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is fitting for driving gaming adoption on cardano and getting gamers on chain for the following reasons. First let me say that the nature of a metaverse has a game like nature that will get people accustom to other games that will use metaverse style tech. This game is projecting ar and vr tech as well as land through nft's and other aspects of crypto gaming that are still early. A quote from Charles Hoskinson I took from the proposals website is as follows the way this proposal's successful implementation would align with the challenge is as follows. To make a great on chain gaming ecosystem we will we need many proof of concepts along the way especially when it comes to anything related to vr and ar. This proposal is creating a proof of concept that is scalable by creating a "Virtual Real Estate Game which creates a detailed digital earth with billions of property boundaries that can be reg. with NTF Deeds". This game will be creating many proof of concepts that we don't currently have and that's why to me the roi on 10 k they are requesting will be through the proof of concepts we get from this game and team building this game.
f6_assessments.q1: It seems like the team does have some technical experience to succeed and the website was informative, as well as the attachment here - https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/idea/381893/46177/download however it looks like the there plan is missing crucial details such as how the funds will be used. I would have liked to see a more detailed breakdown of how the 10 k would be used. This would help to picture the progress and timelines of the completeness of the game. I would encourage the team to add more timelines and a more in-depth plan on how the funding would be used to score higher in this section of the review. As without those details I can only go off of perceived experience and that is why I choose to score this section a 3 out of 5.
f6_assessments.q2: Again i think the gaming ecosystem on cardano needs proof of concepts which is why I scored the impact portion so high but unfortunately the plan has not many dates to indicate the deadlines of the proposal. Without deadlines, it is hard to audit a proposal as deadlines give the catalyst community something to hold the proposal accountable by in perpetuity. Now the end product is also somewhat unclear in regards to what it will look like. I would have appreciated maybe an info graph or sketch to give us a better depiction of what the game will look like so we can hold the proposer accountable for the design as well.

experience: Профессионал, работающий с геопространственными технологиями GIS, GPS, CAD, выполняющий сложные проекты по картографии Realverse и AEC, энтузиаст кардона.
